assignments.label: Assign Biaya Notaris dan Tambahan Lainnya

value.stringValue: Tenor for PRK must be in 12 months

Flow.description: Add Autofill Effective Rate, Admin Fee dan Provision Rate Repromote Expected the latest

formulas.name: func_ConvertErrorMessage
FuncSelectNilaiBangunan
formulas.expression: IF( AND(NOT(ISBLANK({!Nilai_Bangunan_NJOP})), {!Nilai_Bangunan_NJOP} > 0), {!Nilai_Bangunan_NJOP}, IF( AND(NOT(ISBLANK({!Nilai_Bangunan_NJOP_2})), {!Nilai_Bangunan_NJOP_2} > 0), {!Nilai_Bangunan_NJOP_2}, IF( AND(NOT(ISBLANK({!Nilai_Bangunan_NJOP_3})), {!Nilai_Bangunan_NJOP_3} > 0), {!Nilai_Bangunan_NJOP_3}, IF( AND(NOT(ISBLANK({!Nilai_Bangunan})), {!Nilai_Bangunan} > 0), {!Nilai_Bangunan}, 0 ) ) ) )

Flow.label: [Scr] Kalkulator Simulation

fields.name: disp_autofill_pot_result
fields.fieldText:
Max Tenor POT : {!df_MaxTenure.firstRetrievedRecord.max_tenure__c}

Tenor by User : {!Tenor}

Selected Tenor : {!func_SelectMaxTenor}

Effective Rate : {!func_AutoEffectiveRate}

Admin Fee : {!func_AutoAdminFee}

Provision Rate: {!func_AutoProvisionRate}

Max Provision Rate :{!func_MaxProvisionRate}

textTemplates.name: tpl_AdminFee
textTemplates.text: SELECT admin_fee__c from Master_Admin_Fee__c where product_id__c = '3' AND package_id__c = '{!func_PackageID}' AND customer_type__c = 'N' AND ntf_max__c>= {!func_NTFValue} and ntf_min__c<= {!func_NTFValue} ORDER BY admin_fee__c DESC LIMIT 1

textTemplates.name: tpl_EffectiveRate
textTemplates.text: SELECT rate__c FROM Master_Package_Rate__c WHERE product_id__c = '3' AND package_id__c = '{!func_PackageID}' AND ntf_max__c >= {!func_NTFValue} AND ntf_min__c <= {!func_NTFValue} AND max_tenure__c >= {!func_SelectedTenor} AND min_tenure__c <= {!func_SelectedTenor} ORDER BY rate__c DESC LIMIT 1

textTemplates.name: tpl_MaxProvisionRatePOTNotFound
textTemplates.text: SELECT rate__c FROM Master_Provision_Fee__c WHERE product_id__c = '3' AND package_id__c = '{!func_PackageID}' ORDER BY rate__c DESC LIMIT 1

textTemplates.name: tpl_MaxTenure
textTemplates.text: SELECT max_tenure__c from Master_Package_Rate__c WHERE product_id__c = '3' AND package_id__c = '{!func_PackageID}' AND ntf_max__c >= {!func_NTFValue} AND ntf_min__c <= {!func_NTFValue} ORDER BY max_tenure__c DESC LIMIT 1

textTemplates.name: tpl_PackageID
textTemplates.text: SELECT text_package_id__c from Product_Offering__c where Name = '{!func_PackageIDName}'

textTemplates.name: tpl_ProductOffering
textTemplates.text: Select Id, Name, text_package_id__c from Product_Offering__c where Product_Type__c = '{!Product_Type}'

textTemplates.name: tpl_ProvisionRate
textTemplates.text: SELECT rate__c FROM Master_Provision_Fee__c WHERE product_id__c = '3' AND package_id__c = '{!func_PackageID}' AND tenor_max__c >= {!func_SelectedTenor} AND tenor_min__c <= {!func_SelectedTenor} ORDER BY rate__c DESC LIMIT 1

textTemplates.name: tplAssetCode
textTemplates.text: select id, code__c, asset_type_id__c, category_id__c, description__c from API_Asset_Code_Master_Data__c where asset_type_id__c = '{!Jenis_Asset}'
